title: Point of Intersection
text: To solve the system of equations by graphing, we will want to graph both functions and see where they intersect. The point(s) will be our answer.
speech: To solve the system of equations by graphing, we will want to graph both functions and see where they intersect. The point(s) will be our answer.
pacedSpeech: To solve the system of equations by graphing, we will want to graph both functions and see where they intersect. The point(s) will be our answer.

title: Solution
text: When we graph our two functions, where do they intersect? Please enter your answer as (a,b). If there is more than one answer, please enter them as (a,b), (c,d) where $$a<c$$.
speech: When we graph our two functions, where do they intersect? Please enter your answer as (a,b). If there is more than one answer, please enter them as (a,b), (c,d) where  a is less than c .
